name: Go Bananas
description:
Go Bananas is a fast paced arcade platformer where you play as Blue the monkey and race to collect as many bananas as you can before the timer runs out!

Explore hand crafted levels, racing through each level to collect bananas. When you collect all the bananas you move on to the next level, chosen at random from over 100 designed and balanced challenges.

Try to beat your best Banana Total with each go! Keep an eye on the clock and watch out for juicy Super Fruits to extend the time limit and maximise the banana collecting action.

Play in short bursts or sink in for an extended banana chasing session and enjoy the happy vibes all day!

  • 100+ Banana filled Levels
  • Addictive arcade gameplay
  • Challenging obstacles to avoid
  • Play in quick bursts
  • Hilarious post game Monkey Puns
  • Simple, straight forward fun!
